resources.string: It is located 29 km from Bogotá, of which it is part of its area metropolitan, with a population of 126 4094 inhabitants, it is the second largest municipality and town of the province. It is one of the most important salt exploitation centers in Colombia, reason why it is also known as the Salt Capital of Colombia for its production of Salt.
A soup made with chicken, potato and banana, and potatoes in brine, which are potatoes preserved in water with salt and sugar .
Named First Wonder of Colombia in 2007. The cathedral is built in an underground salt mine and has several sculptures made with this mineral. Can be taken guided tours of the cathedral.
Data from the Department of Cundinamarca:

Surface: 24.210 Km2.
Population: 2.721.368
Year of creation: 1886.
Demonym: Cundinamarqués
Capital: Santafé de Bogotá 8,314,305 inhabitants.
Main municipalities: La Vega, Girardot, Guaduas, Facatativa, Fusagasugá, Cáqueza, Zipaquirá, Ubaté, Villeta.
Limits: To the north with the departments of Boyacá and Meta; to the south with the departments of Meta, Huila and Tolima and to the west with the Magdalena River that separates it from the departments of Tolima and Caldas.
Physiography: The territory corresponds to the Eastern Cordillera that penetrates from the south forming the Páramo de Sumapaz; Its middle part presents the plateau of the Sabana de Bogota; and further north the valley of Ubaté and Simijaca. The flat and warm sectors of the department are the Magdalena valley and the part of the Eastern Plains.
Hydrography: Magdalena Guavio Suampuez, Humaca and Negro Rivers. Lagoons and dam; Guatavita, Chingaza, Fúquene, Neusa, Sisga, Chisacá, La Regadera and El Hato.

The most outstanding natural resources are coal and salt, mainly in Zipaquirá, Nemocón and Tausa. It also has lime, iron, sulfur, emeralds, quartz, lead, plaster, copper and marble.
The main agricultural products are coffee, corn, sugar cane, potato, barley, wheat, cassava, cotton, rice, beans and fruits, the department is the first producer of sugarcane panelera sugar of the country. The dairy is highly developed especially in the Savannah from Bogotá and in the valley of Ubaté.
